title: Experience the newly updated Feira De Santana Airport in MSFS!
description:
In addition to the numerous airports in the US, there is also space for airports in other countries. Feira de Santana Airport, located in Brazil, is one such example. Commissioned in 1985, it has been operated by the concessionaire Aeroporto Feira de Santana, comprised of UTC Engineering and Sinart, since May 29, 2012. Recent updates have brought significant improvements to the airport, enhancing the experience for users in MSFS.

For a full overview of items added to the marketplace this week have a look at the video below:
https://youtu.be/Hb1YFrFJpTM
